Name: Runic Relay: The Trials
About the game: Connect With Us! The Game Runic Relay: The Trials is a First Person Platforming game with a focus on Speedrunning. Play as an apprentice wizard who has entered in a competition called “The Trials.” Each trial takes place in a magically constructed dungeon, and consists of a short challenge that you must complete using the tools given to you. These tools include multiple spells, which you can use in tandem with one another to complete tasks that one spell alone might not be able to. Early Access Features Currently, you can expect to see the following in the Early Access period of Runic Relay: 4 Spells: Fireball, Conduit, Tether, and Shear. Spells interact with each other for a total of 10 unique effects. 32 Trials to complete as fast as possible. Targets to shoot, hoops to jump through, gaps to clear, walls to scale, puzzles to solve. In-game global leaderboard to prove your skill against the world. Original soundtrack. Planned Future Features More Trials for more running and spell-slinging. More music tracks. More unique ways to interact with Trials. Collectibles to gather. Secrets to uncover.
